We ensure Boden clothing avoids landfill by donating unsold and faulty items to charity, partnering with Newlife, National Police Aid Convoys, and Scope. Customers in our ‘Pass it On’ recycling scheme help this effort.

Newlife supports disabled and terminally ill children in the UK by providing life-changing equipment and tailored help through a helpline. In 2020, 2021, and 2023, we donated over 7 tonnes of clothing to them.

The National Police Aid Convoys delivers humanitarian aid to disaster zones. Since 2019, we’ve donated clothing to Dominica, Syria, and Africa.

Since 2013, we’ve helped Scope raise over £1 million for a fairer society for people with disabilities. We’ve also donated 30 tonnes of clothing to those in need and over 100,000 items to US charities.
